message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high, but my budget is limited. Could we perhaps agree on a price closer to $10000?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While $10000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to consider a price closer to your offer.  How about $17000? This gives us both some room to compromise and ensures I can still cover the value of the product.
Alice, thank you for your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $15000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
